option.od: print the help message and exit.
filename of the first raw (dat) format file to convert.
filename of the second raw (dat) format file to convert.

synopsis.p: Compares two raw (dat) format file for differences.

description.p: Compares two raw (dat) format file for differences.
Any differences are reported to standard output.

example.description: Compare the raw file "old.dat" with the file "new.dat".
